data.text: @Bethenny @katiecouric I’m wondering why you say you are being asked to help “yet again” like it’s bothersome?!
@Bethenny @katiecouric I just DM you as being from Florida can help guide you to people who are coordinating a lot in North Florida.  We all want to help.
@Bethenny @katiecouric Wish I did....so in need.
@Bethenny @katiecouric @Bethenny you give so much thank you, thank you, thank you. Be safe and stay strong.

@Bethenny @katiecouric Lynn Haven, Florida was hit hard and getting no coverage!  No power for at least 2 months and I have heard the water treatment facility is gone. It is a suburb of Panama City. A family community!!!!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Yes you do have Incredible people in your life , that’s because you are one Incredible Women , you are so Kind 😍
@Ailani25 @Bethenny @katiecouric Yes we do. She does more then anybody. She also needs donation.  So spread the word for help not hate.

@Bethenny @katiecouric Bethenny ... so proud of the woman u r. Yes u have made a lot of money. And that’s where it stops.  U never ever throw ur wealth around.  Ur selfishly helping the needy.  God Bless ❤️
@Bethenny @deeangel63 @katiecouric You know how to get it done! Go girl!

@Bethenny @katiecouric Thank you for all you do Bethenny❤❤❤ I'm grateful you were here in Wilmington NC and helped my community! You have a heart of gold doll😍 Bless you and your beautiful little girl and you are both in my prayers of gratitude and of course, love!❤🌹❤🌹❤🌹❤🌹❤🌹
@Bethenny @katiecouric I nominate B for FEMA Director - you seem to be able to get more done than our government. You’d be awesome at that job!!!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Why are you running around and not the government?? God Bless you!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Every negative comment on here add a dollar to hurricane relief. You should be ashamed. Grow up. Help, or get the hell outta the way!!!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Instead of  talking smack why don't you do something to contribute like volunteer clothes food supplies and money.
@Bethenny @katiecouric You are an inspirational woman we need more men and women like you in the world today
@michwhathappens Says the "social media wizard" with 60 followers. https://t.co/glctYjVVco
@Bethenny @katiecouric Name dropper!! So sad that you get off on helping. Just help and move on!
@Bethenny @katiecouric We just don’t need to hear you talk about your efforts SO MUCH.
@HarrisBalling @Bethenny @katiecouric Because our president still doesn't know the death count of PR.  I bet Bethenny does.

@Bethenny @katiecouric How wonderful that you have made the connections that you have, to help others.  You are doing great and kind things for people who have gone through something horrifying. You are the best.
@Bethenny @katiecouric Thank you both!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Can I come help? I live in Miami! #BStrong
@Bethenny @katiecouric You Rock, Bethenny!
@Bethenny @katiecouric Why do you have to tell us that? #Humblebrag
@Bethenny @katiecouric They know you fight and follow through with action unlike others who talk a "good" game and do nothing.
@Bethenny @katiecouric Thanks for all you’re doing-Virginia was hit hard yesterday also but I’m praying for FL-so much devastation
@Bethenny @katiecouric Way to #SeeTheGood! https://t.co/gV8j0q1HMx
@Bethenny @katiecouric Need more women and MEN like you B!! You’re an amazing person 🙌
@Bethenny @katiecouric Your both amazing aspiring women!! ♥️♥️♥️
